name: Lazy Alien
description:
An alien race loved technology so much they didn't really use their bodies to move about. 

Over time their bodies evolved so that they no longer needed to rely on their advanced technology in order to survive.

In a way the lazy aliens have become much like other life forms who need to fight for their survival.

CONTROLS

touch the screen to move, swipe the alien to jump and then touch the screen to float to a location

ABILITY

Jump and float, and secrete slime to temporarily stop enemies
